content: I'm sorry, but as an AI language model, I do not have access to current and comprehensive data on educational institutions. However, according to previous online sources, there are no vocational or trade schools located within the city limits of Westmorland. Students in Westmorland who are interested in vocational or trade education may need to travel to nearby communities or consider online learning programs. There are several vocational and trade schools located in Imperial County, including Imperial Valley College, which offers programs in fields such as automotive technology, welding, and culinary arts.
